import React from "react"; import "../App.css"; export const Home = ({ showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage, shelves, setShelves }) => { return (

MyReads

Currently Reading

    {shelves['currentlyReading'] ? shelves['currentlyReading'].map((book, index) =>
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors?.map((author, index) => {author}
    )}
    2. ) : 'No books available'}

Want to Read

    {shelves['wantToRead']?.map((book, index) =>
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors?.map((author, index) => {author}
    )}
    2. )}

Read

    {shelves['read'] ? shelves['read'].map((book, index) =>
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors?.map((author, index) => {author}
    )}
    2. ) : 'No books available'}
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)}>Add a book
) }
